instructions.name: add_collateral_admin
docs: Adds a new admin to a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. They do not require a specific role into the account.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The receiver of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account in which the admin shall be added.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to get the submitted signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: add_coordinator_executor
docs: Adds a new executor to a Coordinator account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to which the executor will be added.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: add_coordinator_publisher
docs: Adds a new publisher to a Coordinator account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The transaction sender that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is implemented
by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the New Publisher will be added to.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: add_supported_asset
docs: Adds a new supported asset to the context of the Coordinator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The payer of the rent for the new Supported Asset account. It does not require a particular
role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to which the asset will be added.

accounts.name: mint_token
docs: The mint token of the asset to support. The default Pubkey is used to represent the native
asset but any other address must belong to the token program.

accounts.name: oracle
docs: The oracle account to query the asset price which can be optional for stable assets. The
default Pubkey is used to represent stable assets and any other address must belong to the
pyth program.

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to initialize. The PDA will use the following seeds:
- `SUPPORTED_ASSET_SEED`: Is a constant value equal to "SupportedAsset"
- `coordinator.key()`: Is the coordinator account key the asset will be supported by
- `mint_token.key()`: Is the key of the mint token to support

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: create_collateral
docs: Creates a new Collateral account to the context of the Coordinator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. Must be the collateral creator.

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The payer of the rent for the new Collateral account. It does not require a particular role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that will own the new collateral account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The new collateral account to be created. The Collateral account is the account responsible
for storing the information of a borrower.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The new CollateralAuthority account that will be created. The collateral authority is the
account responsible for managing the assets of the Collateral.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: create_coordinator
docs: Creates a new Coordinator account

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The payer of the rent for the new Coordinator account.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The new coordinator account to be created. The PDA will use the following seeds:
- `COORDINATOR_SEED`: Is a constant value equal to "Coordinator"
- `new_coordinator.id`: Is the coordinator id given as instruction input

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: create_old_collateral
docs: Creates a new old collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. Must be the collateral creator.

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The payer of the rent for the new Collateral account. It does not require a particular role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that will own the new collateral account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The old collateral account to be created. The Collateral account is the account responsible
for storing the information of a borrower.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The new CollateralAuthority account that will be created. The collateral authority is the
account responsible for managing the assets of the Collateral.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: create_single_signer_collateral
docs: Creates a new SingleSignerCollateral account with single owner model

accounts.name: sender
docs: Must be coordinator's collateral_creator (Rain's KMS)

instructions.name: increase_funds_nonce
docs: Increases the funds nonce of a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator executor. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the Collateral account belongs to.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The Collateral account to increase the funds nonce (supports V1 and SingleSignerCollateral).

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: liquidate_assets
docs: Liquidates the assets of a Collateral account to pay a Statement

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match a coordinator executor. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the Statement was published in.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The Collateral Account the Statement is associated to (V1 or SingleSignerCollateral). Must be related with the coordinator.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The Collateral Authority account where the assets are held.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The Statement to liquidate. Must be related with the coordinator and the collateral.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account to transfer the assets to. Must be related with the coordinator.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The SPL Token program.

accounts.name: token2022_program
docs: The token2022 program.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: make_payment_from_collateral
docs: Makes a payment from a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The transaction signer. It must not have an specific role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that custody the treasury to receive the payment.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account that must be owned by the coordinator (V1 or SingleSignerCollateral).

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to validate if the asset to pay is supported by the coordinator.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The collateral authority account that custody the funds to pay.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account to receive the payment. Must match with the coordinator treasury.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The asset of the Mint token to transfer.

accounts.name: oracle
docs: The oracle account to get the price of the asset.

accounts.name: collateral_token_account
docs: The collateral token account to transfer the SPL assets from the collateral.

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: The treasury token account to transfer the SPL assets to the treasury.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program to transfer the SPL assets.

accounts.name: instruction_sysvar
docs: The instruction sysvar to get the signatures data.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: make_payment_from_collateral_for_statement
docs: Makes a payment from a Collateral account for a specific Statement

accounts.name: sender
docs: The transaction signer. It must not have an specific role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that custody the treasury to receive the payment.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account that custody the funds to pay (V1 or SingleSignerCollateral).

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to validate if the asset to pay is supported by the coordinator.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The statement account to pay that is derived from the statement_id and the coordinator.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The collateral authority account that custody the funds to pay.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account to receive the payment. Must match with the coordinator treasury.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The asset of the Mint token to transfer.

accounts.name: oracle
docs: The oracle account to get the price of the asset.

accounts.name: collateral_token_account
docs: The collateral token account to transfer the SPL assets from the collateral.

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: The treasury token account to transfer the SPL assets to the treasury.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program required to transfer the SPL assets.

accounts.name: instruction_sysvar
docs: The instruction sysvar to get the signatures data.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: make_payment_from_user_account
docs: Makes a payment transferring the assets from the transaction sender

accounts.name: sender
docs: The transaction signer. It must not have an specific role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that custody the treasury to receive the payment.

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to validate if the asset to pay is supported by the coordinator.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account to receive the payment. Must match with the coordinator treasury.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The asset of the Mint token to transfer.

accounts.name: oracle
docs: The oracle account to get the price of the asset.

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: The sender token account to transfer the SPL assets from the sender.

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: The treasury token account to transfer the SPL assets to the treasury.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program to transfer the SPL assets.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program

instructions.name: make_payment_from_user_account_for_statement
docs: Makes a payment transferring the assets from the transaction sender for a specific Statement

accounts.name: sender
docs: The transaction signer. It must not have an specific role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that custody the treasury to receive the payment.

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to validate if the asset to pay is supported by the coordinator.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The statement account to pay that must be owned by the coordinator.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: The treasury account to receive the payment. Must match with the coordinator treasury.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The asset of the Mint token to transfer.

accounts.name: oracle
docs: The oracle account to get the price of the asset. Must match with the supported asset oracle.

accounts.name: sender_token_account
docs: The sender token account to transfer the SPL assets from the sender.

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: The treasury token account to transfer the SPL assets to the treasury.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program to transfer the SPL assets.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: mark_statement_paid
docs: Marks an specific amount of a Statement as paid

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must to be a coordinator executor.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the statement belongs to.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The statement account to mark as paid. It must belong to the given coordinator.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: migrate_collateral_info
docs: Migrates the collateral info from the old format to the current format

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. Must be the collateral creator.

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The rent payer for the account reallocation. It might receive the rent back after the
reallocation.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that owns the collateral.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account to migrate the info.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: migrate_to_single_signer_collateral
docs: Migrates a Collateral (multi-admin) to SingleSignerCollateral (single-owner) using multi-admin consensus

accounts.name: sender
docs: Sender of the instruction (does not need to be admin)

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: Receives excess rent when account shrinks

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The V1 collateral to migrate - will be rewritten as SingleSignerCollateral

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account with threshold signatures approving migration

instructions.name: publish_statement
docs: Publishes a new Statement for a Collateral account into the context of the Coordinator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must to be a coordinator publisher.

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The payer of the rent for the new Statement account. It does not require a particular role.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the statement belongs to.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account the statement belongs to (V1 or SingleSignerCollateral). It must belong to the given coordinator.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The statement account to publish. Receive the following seeds:
- `STATEMENT_SEED` - The constant statement seed.
- `statement_id` - The statement ID. It is hashes to guaranty a fixes length of 32 bytes.
- `coordinator_id` - The coordinator ID the statement belongs to.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: remove_collateral_admin
docs: Removes an admin from a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. They do not require a specific role into the account.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The receiver of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account in which the admin shall be removed.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to get the submitted signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: remove_coordinator_executor
docs: Removes an executor from a Coordinator account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account from which the executor will be removed.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: remove_coordinator_publisher
docs: Removes a publisher from a Coordinator account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the publisher will be removed from.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account.

instructions.name: remove_supported_asset
docs: Removes a supported asset from the context of the Coordinator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The reciever of the rent lamports. It does not require a particular role.
information is neither read nor written.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to which the asset will be removed.

accounts.name: supported_asset
docs: The supported asset account to close. Add the close macro to close the account and return
the rent lamports to the sender.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: submit_signatures
docs: Upsert a collateral admin signature into a Collateral account

accounts.name: rent_payer
docs: The signer of the transaction and the payer of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures
account. They do not require a specific role.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The Collateral account the signature will allow the action to be performed.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to push/update the signature.

accounts.name: instruction_sysvar
docs: The instruction sysvar to get the signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: transfer_collateral_team
docs: Transfer a Collateral Account to a new team

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. They do not require a specific role into the account.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The receiver of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account that shall be transferred.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to get the submitted signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: transfer_ownership
docs: Transfers the ownership of a Coordinator account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to be transferred to a new owner.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account

instructions.name: transfer_single_signer_collateral_ownership
docs: Transfers ownership of a SingleSignerCollateral account

accounts.name: owner
docs: Current owner must sign

instructions.name: update_collateral_admin_threshold
docs: Updates the admin threshold of a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. They do not require a specific role into the account.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The receiver of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures account.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account in which the threshold shall be updated.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to get the submitted signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: update_collateral_creator
docs: Updates a Coordinator account collateral creator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to be updated.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account.

instructions.name: update_coordinator_treasury
docs: Updates a Coordinator account supported asset treasury

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must match the coordinator owner. This validation is
implemented by the structure and must be called from the instruction handler.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account to be updated.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program account.

instructions.name: update_statement
docs: Updates a Statement for a Collateral account into the context of the Coordinator

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction that must to be a coordinator publisher.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account the statement belongs to.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account the statement will belong to (V1 or SingleSignerCollateral). It must belong to the given coordinator.

accounts.name: statement
docs: The statement account to update. Receive the following seeds:
- `STATEMENT_SEED` - The constant statement seed.
- `statement_id` - The statement ID. It is hashes to guaranty a fixes length of 32 bytes.
- `coordinator_id` - The coordinator ID the statement belongs to.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: withdraw_collateral_asset
docs: Withdraws a Collateral asset from a Collateral account

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender of the instruction. Must be a collateral admin.

accounts.name: rent_receiver
docs: The receiver of the rent for the CollateralAdminSignatures account.

accounts.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that validates the signatures.

accounts.name: collateral
docs: The collateral account in which the asset shall be withdrawn. It must belong to the
coordinator.

accounts.name: collateral_authority
docs: The collateral authority account that holds the assets to be withdrawn.

accounts.name: collateral_admin_signatures
docs: The CollateralAdminSignatures account to get the submitted signatures.

accounts.name: receiver
docs: The receiver of the asset.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The asset to withdraw. It is None for native assets and Some for SPL tokens.

accounts.name: collateral_token_account
docs: The token account of the collateral that holds the asset to be withdrawn.

accounts.name: receiver_token_account
docs: The token account of the receiver that will receive the asset.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program.

accounts.name: instruction_sysvar
docs: The instruction sysvar to get the signatures.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: withdraw_single_signer_collateral_asset
docs: Withdraws an asset from a SingleSignerCollateral account (owner + coordinator signature)

accounts.name: owner
docs: Owner must sign (can be Squads PDA invoking via CPI)

errors.name: FeedIdRequired
errors.msg: Feed ID is required when the oracle is not the default address

errors.name: DefaultKeysNotAllowed
errors.msg: Oracle and asset pubkeys cannot be both default keys

errors.name: SupportedAssetDoesNotBelongToCoordinator
errors.msg: Supported asset does not belong to the coordinator

errors.name: MintTokenDoesNotBelongToSupportedAsset
errors.msg: Mint token does not belong to the supported asset

errors.name: PriceOracleMismatch
errors.msg: Price oracle does not match the supported asset

types.name: Collateral
docs: Represents the SingleSignerCollateral account stored in the blockchain. It is dynamically sized depending
on the size of the admins list.

fields.name: admins_capacity
docs: The capacity of the admins array

types.name: CollateralAccountCreated
docs: Represents the information of a new Collateral account:
- `coordinator_account`: The address of the Coordinator account the Collateral account belongs to
- `collateral_account`: The address where the Collateral account was created
- `authority_address`: The address of the Collateral authority that will manage the funds.
- `collateral_admin_signatures_account`: The address of the CollateralAdminSignatures account
that was created
- `name`: The name assigned to the Collateral account
- `user`: The user that created the Collateral account

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The address of the Coordinator account the Collateral account belongs to

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address where the Collateral account was created

fields.name: authority_address
docs: The address of the Collateral authority that will manage the funds

fields.name: name
docs: The name assigned to the Collateral account

fields.name: user
docs: The user that created the Collateral account

types.name: CollateralAdminAdded
docs: Represent the information to emit when an admin is added to a Collateral account
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the admin was added
- `admin`: The address of the admin that was added

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the admin was added

fields.name: admin
docs: The address of the admin that was added

types.name: CollateralAdminRemoved
docs: Represents the information to emit when an admin is removed from a Collateral account
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the admin was removed
- `admin`: The address of the admin that was removed

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the admin was removed

fields.name: admin
docs: The address of the admin that was removed

types.name: CollateralAdminSignatures
docs: Represents the CollateralAdminSignatures account stored in the blockchain. The account is
owned by a Collateral account and is used to store the signatures of the admins of the
collateral account to avoid the transaction size limit.
- `id`: The hash of the allowed parameters that works as account id.
- `bump`: The bump of the CollateralAdminSignatures account.
- `collateral`: The address of the collateral account that owns the signatures.
- `rent_payer`: The address of the account rent payer.
- `is_in_progress`: The flag to indicate in a request if in progress or not, e.i., at least one
admin has signed the request with a specific parameters.
- `signers`: The list of admins that have signed the request.
- `action_message_hash`: The hash of the allowed parameters.

fields.name: id
docs: The hash of the allowed parameters that works as account id

fields.name: rent_payer
docs: The address of the account rent payer

fields.name: is_in_progress
docs: The flag to indicate in a request if in progress or not.

fields.name: signers
docs: The list of admins that have signed the request

types.name: CollateralAdminSignaturesSubmitted
docs: Represents the information to emit when the signatures are submitted to the CollateralAdminSignatures
account
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the admin signature was added
- `signatures_account`: The address of the CollateralAdminSignatures account where the admin signature was added
- `signers`: The address of the admins that submitted the signatures
- `action`: The action that was signed

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the admin signature was added

fields.name: signatures_account
docs: The address of the CollateralAdminSignatures account where the admin signature was added

fields.name: signers
docs: The address of the admin that submitted the signatures

fields.name: action
docs: The action that was signed

types.name: CollateralAdminThresholdUpdated
docs: Represents the information to emit when the admin threshold of a Collateral account is updated
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the admin threshold was updated
- `threshold`: The updated value for the admin threshold

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the admin threshold was updated

fields.name: threshold
docs: The updated value for the admin threshold

types.name: CollateralCreatorUpdated
docs: Represents the information to emit when a collateral creator is updated into a Coordinator account

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the collateral creator was updated in.

fields.name: collateral_creator
docs: The Pubkey of the new collateral creator

fields.name: old_collateral_creator
docs: The Pubkey of the old collateral creator

types.name: CollateralFundsNonceIncreased
docs: Represents the information to emit when the funds nonce of a Collateral account is increased
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the funds nonce was increased
- `nonce`: The new value for the funds admin_data_nonce

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the funds nonce was increased

fields.name: nonce
docs: The new value for the funds nonce

types.name: CollateralOld
docs: Represents the V1 Collateral account stored in the blockchain. The account is owned by a
Coordinator account and is used to store the information and assets owned by a borrower.

types.name: CollateralTeamTransferred
docs: Represents the information to emit when a Collateral account is transferred to a new team
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account that was transferred
- `new_name`: The new name assigned to the Collateral account
- `new_admins`: The new list of admins for the Collateral account
- `new_threshold`: The new threshold for the Collateral account

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account that was transferred

fields.name: new_name
docs: The new name assigned to the Collateral account

fields.name: new_admins
docs: The new list of admins for the Collateral account

fields.name: new_threshold
docs: The new threshold for the Collateral account

types.name: CollateralWithdrawal
docs: Represents the information to emit when a Collateral asset is withdrawn from a Collateral account
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account where the asset was withdrawn
- `asset`: The address of the asset that was withdrawn
- `recipient`: The address of the account that received the asset
- `amount_of_asset`: The amount of the asset that was withdrawn

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account where the asset was withdrawn

fields.name: asset
docs: The address of the asset that was withdrawn

fields.name: recipient
docs: The address of the account that received the asset

fields.name: amount_of_asset
docs: The amount of the asset that was withdrawn

types.name: Coordinator
docs: Represents the coordinator account stored in the blockchain. The coordinator account is owned by
the lender and is used to managed the lending terms and conditions, such as the supported assets,
borrowers collaterals account creation, and statements publishing through the different roles
that belong to the coordinator.

fields.name: id
docs: Coordinator account id

fields.name: bump
docs: Coordinator account bump use to derive the address where the account was created

fields.name: owner
docs: Is the account owner of the coordinator allowed to managed the other roles and to list new
supported assets.

fields.name: collateral_creator
docs: Is the account allowed to create Collateral accounts for coordinator borrowers.

fields.name: treasury
docs: The Treasury Account is the account where the payments are collected.

fields.name: publishers
docs: A list with the publishers accounts allowed to publish statements for the coordinator.

fields.name: executors
docs: A list with the executors accounts responsible of payments management and statements liquidations.

types.name: ExecutorAdded
docs: Represents the information to emit when an executor is added into a Coordinator account

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the executor was added to.

fields.name: executor
docs: The Pubkey of the added executor.

types.name: ExecutorRemoved
docs: Represents the information to emit when an executor is removed from a Coordinator account

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the executor was removed from.

fields.name: executor
docs: The Pubkey of the executor that was removed.

types.name: Liquidation
docs: Represents the information to emit when a liquidation is made.
- `coordinator_account`: The address of the Coordinator account the Collateral account belongs to.
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account were the funds were paid from.
- `liquidator`: The address of the liquidator.
- `statement_id`: The id of the statement that was liquidated.
- `assets`: The addresses of the assets liquidated.
- `asset_decimals`: The decimals of the assets liquidated.
- `amounts_in_assets`: The liquidated amount in assets.
- `amounts_in_cents`: The liquidated amounts in cents.
- `fees_in_assets`: The fees in asset for each asset liquidated.
- `net_amount_in_cents`: The net amount in cents of the liquidation.
The vector of `assets`, `asset_decimals`, `amounts_in_assets`, `amounts_in_cents`,
`fees_in_assets` have the same length and the order correspond to the asset, e.i., values in the
index `i` correspond to the asset in the index `i`.

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The address of the Coordinator account the Collateral account belongs to.

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account were the funds were paid from.

fields.name: liquidator
docs: The address of the liquidator.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The id of the statement that was liquidated.

fields.name: assets
docs: The addresses of the assets liquidated.

fields.name: asset_decimals
docs: The decimals of the assets liquidated.

fields.name: amounts_in_assets
docs: The liquidated amount in assets.

fields.name: amounts_in_cents
docs: The liquidated amounts in cents.

fields.name: fees_in_assets
docs: The fees in asset for each asset liquidated.

fields.name: net_amount_in_cents
docs: The net amount in cents of the liquidation.

types.name: MakePaymentFromCollateralRequest
docs: Defines the request to make a payment using the funds stored into a collateral account.
- `team_or_statement_id` - The team ID or statement ID to make the payment to.
- `amount_in_asset` - The amount in asset to make the payment.
- `signature_expiration_time` - The timestamp when the publisher/executor signature expires.
- `signature_salt` - The salt used to generate the signature.

fields.name: team_or_statement_id
docs: The team ID or statement ID to make the payment to.

fields.name: amount_in_asset
docs: The amount in asset to make the payment.

fields.name: signature_expiration_time
docs: The timestamp when the publisher/executor signature expires.

fields.name: signature_salt
docs: The salt used to generate the signature.

types.name: MakePaymentFromUserAccountRequest
docs: Defines the request to make a payment using the funds stored into a user account.
- `team_or_statement_id` - The team ID or statement ID to make the payment to.
- `amount_in_asset` - The amount in asset to make the payment.

fields.name: team_or_statement_id
docs: The team ID or statement ID to make the payment to.

fields.name: amount_in_asset
docs: The amount in asset to make the payment.

types.name: MarkStatementPaidRequest
docs: Represents the information required to Mark a Statement as Paid.
- `statement_id` - The external ID of the statement to mark as paid.
- `amount_in_cents` - The amount of cents to mark as paid.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The external ID of the statement to mark as paid.

fields.name: amount_in_cents
docs: The amount of cents to mark as paid.

types.name: NewCollateral
docs: Structure to store the initial information required to initialize a Collateral account.
Including:
- `id`: An Id to derive the address of the Collateral account.
- `name`: The name of the Collateral account.
- `initial_admin`: The initial admin of the Collateral account.

fields.name: id
docs: An Id to derive the address of the Collateral account.

fields.name: name
docs: The name of the Collateral account.

fields.name: initial_admin
docs: The initial admin of the Collateral account.

types.name: NewCoordinator
docs: Structure to store the initial information required to initialize a coordinator account.

fields.name: id
docs: The coordinator account id used to derive the address where the account will be created

fields.name: owner
docs: The account that will be owner of the new coordinator account.

fields.name: collateral_creator
docs: The collateral creator account.

fields.name: treasury
docs: The treasury address

fields.name: initial_publisher
docs: The address of the first publisher account.

fields.name: initial_executor
docs: The address of the first executor account.

types.name: NewSingleSignerCollateral
docs: Structure to store the initial information required to initialize a SingleSignerCollateral account.

types.name: NewSupportedAsset
docs: Structure to store the initial information required to initialize a supported asset account.
Including:
- The optional feed id corresponding to the price oracle to assign.
- The price uncertainty threshold in percentage with seven decimals.
- The stale threshold in seconds indicating the maximum age a price can reach before being
considered to old to be used.
- The Fee in Basic points to be charged to the borrower when the asset is used for payment or
liquidations.

fields.name: feed_id
docs: An optional feed id corresponding to the price oracle to assign.

fields.name: price_uncertainty_threshold
docs: A percentage value with seven decimals that represent the maximum price uncertainty allowed
for the asset operations. For example, if the price uncertainty threshold is 15000000, the
price result of Pyth confidence/price must be lower that 1,5%. Maximum threshold is 429,4967295%.

fields.name: stale_threshold
docs: An stale threshold in seconds indicating the maximum age a price can reach before being
considered to old to be used.

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: The Fee in Basic points to be charged to the borrower when the asset is used for payment or
liquidations.

types.name: NewTreasury
docs: Represents the information to emit when a treasury is updated into a Coordinator account

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the treasury was updated in.

fields.name: treasury
docs: The Pubkey of the new treasury

fields.name: old_treasury

types.name: OwnershipTransferred
docs: Represents the information to emit when the ownership of a coordinator account is transferred

fields.name: coordinator_account

fields.name: new_owner

types.name: PaymentFromCollateral
docs: Represents the information to emit when a payment is made from a Collateral account for a team.
- `payer`: The address of the payer.
- `team_id`: The id of the team.
- `collateral_account`: The address of the Collateral account were the funds were paid from.
- `asset`: The address of the asset paid.
- `amount_in_asset`: The amount of the asset paid.
- `amount_in_cents`: The amount in cents paid.
- `fee_in_asset`: The value of the fee paid in asset.
- `asset_decimals`: The decimals of the asset.
- `nonce`: The nonce for the collateral funds nonce.
- `expires_at`: The expiration date of the given signature to allow the payment from collateral.

fields.name: payer
docs: The address of the payer.

fields.name: team_id
docs: The id of the team.

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The address of the Collateral account were the funds were paid from.

fields.name: amount_in_asset

fields.name: fee_in_asset
docs: The fee in asset.

fields.name: asset_decimals
docs: The decimals of the asset.

fields.name: nonce
docs: The nonce for the collateral funds nonce.

fields.name: expires_at
docs: The expiration date of the given signature to allow the payment from collateral.

- `nonce`: The nonce for the collateral funds nonce.
- `expires_at`: The expiration date of the given signature to allow the payment from collateral.

- `amount_in_asset`: The amount of the asset paid.
- `amount_in_cents`: The amount in cents paid.
- `fee_in_asset`: The value of the fee paid in asset.
- `asset_decimals`: The decimals of the asset.

fields.name: payer
docs: The address of the payer.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The id of the statement the payment was made to.

fields.name: team_id
docs: The id of the team the payment was made to.

fields.name: asset
docs: The address of the asset used to pay.

fields.name: amount_in_asset

fields.name: amount_in_cents
docs: The amount in cents paid.

fields.name: fee_in_asset
docs: The value of the fee paid in asset.

fields.name: asset_decimals
docs: The decimals of the asset.

fields.name: feed_id
docs: `FeedId` but avoid the type alias because of compatibility issues with Anchor's `idl-build` feature.

fields.name: publish_time
docs: The timestamp of this price update in seconds

fields.name: prev_publish_time
docs: The timestamp of the previous price update. This field is intended to allow users to
identify the single unique price update for any moment in time:
for any time t, the unique update is the one such that prev_publish_time < t <= publish_time.
Note that there may not be such an update while we are migrating to the new message-sending logic,
as some price updates on pythnet may not be sent to other chains (because the message-sending
logic may not have triggered). We can solve this problem by making the message-sending mandatory
(which we can do once publishers have migrated over).
Additionally, this field may be equal to publish_time if the message is sent on a slot where
where the aggregation was unsuccesful. This problem will go away once all publishers have
migrated over to a recent version of pyth-agent.

types.name: PriceUpdateV2
docs: A price update account. This account is used by the Pyth Receiver program to store a verified price update from a Pyth price feed.
It contains:
- `write_authority`: The write authority for this account. This authority can close this account to reclaim rent or update the account to contain a different price update.
- `verification_level`: The [`VerificationLevel`] of this price update. This represents how many Wormhole guardian signatures have been verified for this price update.
- `price_message`: The actual price update.
- `posted_slot`: The slot at which this price update was posted.

types.name: SignatureSubmissionRequest
docs: Represents the model to submit the signatures to the collateral account.
- `id`: The action message hash of the action that the signature will allow to perform.
- `signature_submission_type`: The type of the action the signature will allow to perform.
- `salts`: The salts used to generate the signatures.

fields.name: target_nonce
docs: The nonce value that is expected to be used with the signatures

fields.name: signature_submission_type
docs: The type of the signature submission

fields.name: salts
docs: The salts used to generate the signatures

types.name: SignatureSubmissionType
docs: Represent the type of signatures that can be submitted to the collateral account depending on the
action to be performed.

fields.name: new_admin
docs: The address of the new admin to add

fields.name: admin_to_remove
docs: The address of the admin to remove

fields.name: new_threshold
docs: The new threshold

fields.name: sender
docs: The sender of the withdraw transaction

fields.name: receiver
docs: The receiver of the funds

fields.name: asset
docs: The asset to withdraw

fields.name: withdraw_request
docs: The additional withdraw information

fields.name: new_owner
docs: The new owner of the SingleSignerCollateral account

types.name: SingleSignerCollateral
docs: Single-owner collateral model for smart account support.
The owner can be any Pubkey including PDAs (Squads, Realms, custom programs).

types.name: Statement
docs: Represents the Statement account stores in the blockchain. The account is owner by a Coordinator
and is related to a Collateral account; it is used to store the information related to the
collateral (the borrower) partial debt (It is not necessary to manage all the debt in one
statement).
- `id` - The statement id
- `bump` - The bump of the Statement account
- `coordinator` - The Coordinator that created the Statement
- `collateral` - The Collateral that the Statement is related to
- `team_id` - The team ID that owns the Statement
- `closing_balance_in_cents` - The total debt that must be paid in the statement by the
borrower
- `paid_amount_in_cents` - The amount of debt that has been paid in the statement
- `liquidatable_after` - The date after which the collateral is liquidatable

types.name: StatementMarkedPaid
docs: Represents the information published when the total/partial debt in the statement has been paid.
- `statement_id`: The id of the statement that has been paid.
- `amount_in_cents`: The amount paid in dollar cents.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The id of the statement that has been paid.

fields.name: amount_in_cents
docs: The amount paid in dollar cents.

types.name: StatementPublished
docs: Represents the information published into a Statement Account.
- `coordinator_account`: The coordinator account the statement was published in.
- `collateral_account`: The collateral account the statement was published in.
- `statement_id`: The statement id.
- `team_id`: The id of the team the statement belongs to.
- `closing_account_balance_cents`: The total value to pay in dollar cents for the statement.
- `liquidatable_after`: The date in seconds after which the statement can be liquidated.

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the statement was published in.

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The collateral account the statement was published in.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The statement id.

fields.name: team_id
docs: The id of the team the statement belongs to.

fields.name: closing_account_balance_cents
docs: The total value to pay in dollar cents for the statement.

fields.name: liquidatable_after
docs: The date in seconds after which the statement can be liquidated.

types.name: StatementUpdated
docs: Represents the information updated in a Statement Account.
- `coordinator_account`: The coordinator account the statement is related to.
- `collateral_account`: The collateral account the statement is related to.
- `statement_id`: The statement id.
- `team_id`: The id of the team the statement belongs to.
- `closing_account_balance_cents`: The total value to pay in dollar cents for the statement.
- `liquidatable_after`: The date in seconds after which the statement can be liquidated.

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The coordinator account the statement is related to.

fields.name: collateral_account
docs: The collateral account the statement is related to.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The statement id.

fields.name: team_id
docs: The id of the team the statement belongs to.

fields.name: closing_account_balance_cents
docs: The total value to pay in dollar cents for the statement.

fields.name: liquidatable_after
docs: The date in seconds after which the statement can be liquidated.

types.name: SupportedAsset
docs: Represents the Stored Asset account stored in the blockchain. The account is owned by a
Coordinator account and is used to store the information related to a asset that is accepted by
the coordinator as valid Collateral, e.i, what assets are considered to increase the collateral
value of a borrower and the assets that can be used to pay/liquidate a debt.

fields.name: coordinator
docs: The coordinator account that owns the supported asset

fields.name: asset
docs: The address of the asset tu Support. It may be either the default key for supporting the
native asset or the SPL token address for any other assets.

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump of the supported asset account

fields.name: oracle
docs: The oracle address where the token price is going to be queried. The address must belongs to
a PriceUpdateV2 account of the Pyth Network protocol.

fields.name: feed_id
docs: The price ID to query the token price to the oracle. It the Feed Id stored by the PriceUpdateV2
oracle account and its verified when try to query a price, so it is important the feed id
matches with the given oracle. Can look for Feed Ids in https://www.pyth.network/developers/price-feed-ids.

fields.name: price_uncertainty_threshold
docs: A percentage value with seven decimals that represent the maximum price uncertainty allowed
for the asset operations. For example, if the price uncertainty threshold is 15000000, the
price result of Pyth confidence/price must be lower that 1,5%. Maximum threshold is 429,4967295%.

fields.name: stale_threshold
docs: A time in seconds after which a price is considered staled, e.i, too old to be considered
valid or usable.

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: The fee in basic points that will be charged to the borrower when the asset is used for
payment or liquidations. It can take values between 0 and 10000 where 10000 is equivalent to
a fee of 100%.

types.name: SupportedAssetAdded
docs: Represent the information to emit when a supported asset is added to a coordinator.
- `coordinator_account`: The address of the coordinator that owns the supported asset.
- `asset`: The address of the asset that is supported.
- `oracle`: The address of the oracle to query the asset price.
- `stale_threshold`: The threshold for the oracle to be considered stale.
- `fee_bps`: The fee in basis points.

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The address of the coordinator that owns the supported asset.

fields.name: asset
docs: The address of the asset that is supported.

fields.name: oracle
docs: The address of the oracle to query the asset price.

fields.name: stale_threshold
docs: The threshold for the oracle to be considered stale.

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: The fee in basis points.

types.name: SupportedAssetRemoved
docs: Represent the information to emit when a supported asset is removed from a coordinator.
- `coordinator_account`: The address of the coordinator that not longer owns the supported asset.
- `asset`: The address of the asset that is no longer supported.
- `oracle`: The address of the oracle used to query the asset price.
- `stale_threshold`: The threshold for the oracle to be considered stale.
- `fee_bps`: The fee in basis points used for the supported asset.

fields.name: coordinator_account
docs: The address of the coordinator that not longer owns the supported asset.

fields.name: asset
docs: The address of the asset that is no longer supported.

fields.name: oracle
docs: The address of the oracle used to query the asset price.

fields.name: stale_threshold
docs: The threshold for the oracle to be considered stale.

fields.name: fee_bps
docs: The fee in basis points used for the supported asset.

fields.name: new_admin_threshold

types.name: UpsertStatement
docs: Represents the information required to Create or Update an Statement account.
- `statement_id` - The external ID of the statement to create or update.
- `team_id` - The ID of the team that owns the statement.
- `closing_balance_in_cents` - The total debt that must be paid in the statement by the
borrower.
- `liquidatable_after` - The date after which the collateral is liquidatable.

fields.name: statement_id
docs: The external ID of the statement to create or update.

fields.name: team_id
docs: The ID of the team that owns the statement.

fields.name: closing_balance_in_cents
docs: The total debt that must be paid in the statement by the borrower.

fields.name: liquidatable_after
docs: The date in seconds after which the collateral is liquidatable.

types.name: VerificationLevel
docs: Pyth price updates are bridged to all blockchains via Wormhole.
Using the price updates on another chain requires verifying the signatures of the Wormhole guardians.
The usual process is to check the signatures for two thirds of the total number of guardians, but this can be cumbersome on Solana because of the transaction size limits,
so we also allow for partial verification.
This enum represents how much a price update has been verified:
- If `Full`, we have verified the signatures for two thirds of the current guardians.
- If `Partial`, only `num_signatures` guardian signatures have been checked.
# Warning
Using partially verified price updates is dangerous, as it lowers the threshold of guardians that need to collude to produce a malicious price update.

types.name: WithdrawCollateralAssetRequest
docs: Structure to store the information required to withdraw an asset from a Collateral account.
Including:
- `amount_of_asset`: The amount of the asset to withdraw.
- `signature_expiration_time`: The time when the signature expires.
- `coordinator_signature_salt`: The salt used to generate the coordinator's signature.
- `collateral_admins_signatures_salts`: The salts used to generate the signatures of the admins.

fields.name: amount_of_asset
docs: The amount of the asset to withdraw.

fields.name: signature_expiration_time
docs: The time when the signature expires.

fields.name: coordinator_signature_salt
docs: The salt used to generate the coordinator's signature.

types.name: WithdrawSingleSignerCollateralAssetRequest
docs: Structure for SingleSignerCollateral withdrawal requests (owner-signed, no threshold).
